data.title: August Films: Celebrating Richard Basehart
data.meta_description: This week's film is Portrait in Black (1960) 112 mins; Not Rated. A socialite falls in love with the doctor caring for her sick husband, who is then murdered. Directed by Michael Gordon; starring Lana Turner, Anthony Quinn, and Richard Basehart.
data.text:
This week's film is Portrait in Black (1960) 112 mins; Not Rated.

A socialite falls in love with the doctor caring for her sick husband, who is then murdered.

Directed by Michael Gordon; starring Lana Turner, Anthony Quinn, and Richard Basehart.
